result.eng: Would you like to have lunch with me?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat lón a chaitheamh liom
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat lón a chaitheamh liom
result.html: Ar mhaith leat lón a chaitheamh liomWould you like to have lunch with me?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat lón a ċaiṫeaṁ liomWould you like to have lunch with me?

result.ga: Cuireadh cosc ar chaitheamh tobac i dtithe tábhairne
result.orig: Cuireadh cosc ar chaitheamh tobac i dtithe tábhairne
result.html: Cuireadh cosc ar chaitheamh tobac i dtithe tábhairneSmoking was banned in pubs.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ cosc ar ċaiṫeaṁ tobac i dtiṫe táḃairneSmoking was banned in pubs.

result.eng: I learned Esperanto as a hobby.
result.ga: D'fhoghlaim mé Esperanto mar chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: D'fhoghlaim mé Esperanto mar chaitheamh aimsire
result.html: D'fhoghlaim mé Esperanto mar chaitheamh aimsireI learned Esperanto as a hobby.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟoġlaim mé Esperanto mar ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireI learned Esperanto as a hobby.

result.eng: I love wearing high heavy boots.
result.ga: Is breá liom buataisí arda troma a chaitheamh
result.orig: Is breá liom buataisí arda troma a chaitheamh
result.html: Is breá liom buataisí arda troma a chaitheamhI love wearing high heavy boots.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom buataisí arda troma a ċaiṫeaṁI love wearing high heavy boots.

result.eng: I have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.
result.ga: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamh
result.orig: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamh
result.html: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamhI have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.
result.ponchtml: Tá orm hata a ċaiṫeaṁ toisc go ḃfuil an ġrian ag taitneaṁI have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.

result.eng: It is illegal to smoke here.
result.ga: Tá sé mídhleathach tobac a chaitheamh anseo
result.orig: Tá sé mídhleathach tobac a chaitheamh anseo
result.html: Tá sé mídhleathach tobac a chaitheamh anseoIt is illegal to smoke here.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé míḋleaṫaċ tobac a ċaiṫeaṁ anseoIt is illegal to smoke here.

result.eng: You can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ga: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar
result.orig: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar
result.html: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbótharYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a ċloig a ċaiṫeaṁ ar an mbóṫarYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.

result.eng: It was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ga: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.orig: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.html: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé fíorḋeas cúpla seaċtain a ċaiṫeaṁ anseo aċ beiḋ mé sásta a ḃeiṫ ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.

result.eng: Now, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ga: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.html: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ponchtml: Anois ba ṁaiṫ liom cúpla ceist eile a ċur ort faoi ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.

result.ga: Tá sé an-leadránach mar chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: Tá sé an-leadránach mar chaitheamh aimsire
result.html: Tá sé an-leadránach mar chaitheamh aimsireIt's a very boring pastime.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé an-leadránaċ mar ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireIt's a very boring pastime.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.html: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de ṁisneaċ aige t-léinte a ċaiṫeaṁ a ḃí ċoṁ teann sin go mbeaḋ eagla ort go bpollfaḋ a ḋidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
